page.title: 16THE REX CINEMA CONTINUED
page.content: Touring companies go there instead of the Rex prior to their West-End showing. The space left from the screen being moved forward will be hired to shops for another source of income. The most{popular films}and{plays have proved to be{comedies.}The Rex shows films for all different age groups and on average{1500 people go {each week.}The manager believes that the main things that attract people are,{the type of film, film stars, and the{attractive surroundings. {Twelve people}are employed at the Rex but only{two work full time. Ten {extra people}are hired when a play is being produced but their jobs are terminated when the play finishes.
